table.name: vtiger_roomsusers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsusers` ( `roomsusersid` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `room_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `room_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `archived` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `favorite` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`roomsusersid`), KEY `vtiger_roomsusers_roomsusersid_idx` (`roomsusersid`) USING BTREE, KEY `vtiger_roomsusers_room_id` (`room_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_roomsuserscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsuserscf` ( `roomsusersid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`roomsusersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_roomsusers_user_field
vtiger_roomsusers
